entry.title: Recession Worries Spark $528 Million Outflow From Crypto Market
entry.summary:
With recent estimates showing a startling $528 million in withdrawals from digital asset investment products, crypto markets are under great flux. Rising US economic worries combined with geopolitical concerns and significant market liquidations help to explain this fall. The outflows capture a general sense of concern among investors as they consider how possible economic downturns would affect the crypto scene.
Data from CoinShares shows that institutional crypto investment products had their first outflow in four weeks last week‚Äî$528 million overall. Along with geopolitical issues and more general market liquidations across many asset classes, this fall is ascribed to worries of a recession in the United States.
With $531 million, the US led these outflows; other areas like Ge‚Ä¶

entry.title: Opportunities For Bitcoin Remittance in West Africa
entry.summary: Africa stands at the cusp of a financial revolution as Ecowas region financial ministers and central bank governors advanced plans to launch the single currency initiative, known as the ECO. The Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) promises to reshape the economic landscape of 15 nations with the introduction of ECO. Amidst the buzz of this unified currency, a digital contender‚ÄîBitcoin‚Äîemerges from the shadows, offering unprecedented solutions to the continent's remittance woes. Could Bitcoin hold the key to a more inclusive, cost-effective, and resilient financial future for Africa? Not even a question over here, but an experience. As the ECO currency initiative progresses, Bitcoin emerges as a compelling alternative, offering unique solutions to longstanding financial chall‚Ä¶

entry.title: Metaplanet To Raise $70 Million To Buy More Bitcoin
entry.summary:
Metaplanet, a publicly listed Japanese company, has announced plans to raise up to ¬•10.08 billion ($70 million) through a gratis allotment of stock acquisition rights to existing shareholders. The majority of funds raised will be used to purchase additional Bitcoin.
JUST IN: üáØüáµ Metaplanet announces to raise ¬•10.08 billion to buy more #Bitcoin pic.twitter.com/HXBf7RNeMx ‚Äî Bitcoin Magazine (@BitcoinMagazine) August 6, 2024
The company will issue one stock acquisition right per common share to shareholders of record on September 5. These rights will allow shareholders to acquire Metaplanet common stock at an exercise price of 555 yen (~$4) during the exercise period from September 6 to October 15. Metaplanet currently holds around 246 bitcoins worth ~$13.4 million. By raising $70 million, the company aims to significantly expand its Bitcoin treasury as part of its long-term growth strategy. This move mirrors the approach pioneered by MicroStrategy, the Nasdaq-listed business intelligence firm. Since 2020, MicroStrategy has raised debt and sold shares to accumulate over 220,000 Bitcoin, now worth billions.¬† By positioning itself as Japan's leading publicly traded bitcoin holding company, Metaplanet hopes to follow MicroStrategy's playbook and create similar shareholder value. It aims to pioneer Japanese listed firms in adopting Bitcoin as a reserve asset. Bitcoin offers twin benefits as an asset with long-term appreciation potential that also hedges against fiat currency depreciation. Building a Bitcoin treasury strengthens the company's balance sheet and supports future growth initiatives. Disclaimer: Bitcoin Magazine is wholly owned by BTC Inc., which also operates UTXO Management, a regulated capital allocator focused on the digital assets industry and invested in Metaplanet. UTXO invests in a variety of Bitcoin businesses, and maintains significant holdings in digital assets.

entry.title: SEC Fights Coinbase‚Äôs Request To Review Gensler‚Äôs Crypto Related Emails
entry.summary:
Late Monday, the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) submitted a memorandum to the Southern District Court of New York, pleading for the rejection of Coinbase‚Äôs (NASDAQ: COIN) extensive discovery demands, including personal crypto related emails by chairman Gary Gensler. The SEC characterizes these requests as ‚Äúbreathtakingly broad,‚Äù arguing that they are not only extraneous but also impose an undue burden on the regulator.
For The Entire Crypto Industry: Coinbase Presses SEC
At the heart of this litigation is the SEC‚Äôs assertion that Coinbase operated as a securities exchange without proper registration, thereby violating federal securities laws. The commission‚Äôs charges against Coinbase hinge on the platform‚Äôs alleged failure to register as a securities exchange or broker-dea‚Ä¶

entry.title: Crypto Fear & Greed Index Drops To 2-Year Lows, What This Means
entry.summary:
Over the last week, the Crypto Fear & Greed Index has seen a steady decline as prices have struggled to hold up in the market. Following the Bitcoin price crash below $50,000 that rocked the market, the index plunged farther into fear. The result of this is the lowest level that the index has been in the last two years.
Why The Crypto Fear & Greed Index Is Important
The Crypto Fear & Greed Index uses a number scale of 1-100 to represent the market sentiment at any given time. This scale measures a number of indicators such as social media keywords, market volatility and volume, and dominance in the market.
With the data collected, the index uses numbers to represent whether investors are feeling fearful, greedy, or neutral and to what extent they are feeling this. A score of 1-24 r‚Ä¶

Pump(.)fun overtakes ETH for daily revenue. Jito overtakes Lido for fees collected. $1.5bn altcoin unlocks in August, $600m XRP. Compound DAO faces $25m governance attack. JUP vote to reduce supply 30% is this week. JUP vote to reduce supply 30% is this week.

entry.title: New Technology Is Making Bionic Limbs More Affordable
entry.summary: Alt Bionics founder and CEO Ryan Saavedra talks with Decrypt's Jason Nelson about the Genesis Hand, an affordable $5,000 bionic limb designed for daily use.

entry.title: The Story of Solana Meme Coin Billy
entry.summary: Billy is the largest Solana meme coin on Pumpdotfun, peaking at a market cap of over $200 million. But it wasn‚Äôt always smooth sailing. Minutes after launching Billy‚Äôs dev abandoned him and sold the majority of their tokens. At the time, the tokens were worth $1,116 but at today‚Äôs value they‚Äôd be worth more than $8.65 million.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 166 - CRYPTO AND STOCKS FALL
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +$44m, ETH ETFs: -$133m. ETH falls as Grayscale ETF outflows continue. ETH ETFs still see $1bn of daily volume. Liquidations hit $250m in sell-off. ETH Open Interest hits ATH at CME. BTC whales have bought $23bn in July. SOL weekly active addresses hits ATH. Bitstamp to distribute Mt. Gox BTC today. Russia to legalise crypto mining & payments. Lummis set to introduce BTC strategic reserve bill. Harris will not be at Bitcoin Nashville. BTC going to $52m by 2050: VanEck. Hashdex file for mixed BTC & ETH ETF. Coinbase to make tokenised treasuries fund. Polymarket partners with Moonpay for on-ramp. Ferrari accepts crypto in Europe. Bitfarms stopped in poison-pill strategy. Riot buys another miner for $93m.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 165 - ETH ETFs TAKE IN 107M
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$78m, ETH ETFs: +$107m. BTC falls amid ETF outflows & Mt. Gox movements. ETH ETFs see ‚Äòvery solid‚Äô first day $107m inflows. Grayscale ETH trust sees $484m outflow. ETH ETF volumes come out at 23% of BTC. Debate about whether strong flows will continue. SOL DEX volume continues to rise above ETH. Harris may also speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Harris could be far more open to Bitcoin: Cuban. BTC symbol lights up Vegas Sphere. Coinbase continues to pursue Gensler emails. dYdX explores sale of derivatives tech. dYdX site recovers after DNS attack. JD to create Hong Kong stablecoin. Bitwise uses ENS addresses for ETH ETFs. BlackRock applies for ENA cash allocation. Uber CEO wants to accept BTC.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 164 - ETH ETF DAY!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$534m. ETH outperforms slightly as 9 ETFs set to launch. Grayscale moves $1bn ETH to Coinbase for outflows. Biggest BlackRock ETF inflow day in 4 months. Mt Gox moves $2.8bn BTC for distributions. US government moves $4m BTC to Coinbase. Bedford FC buys $4.5m BTC. Hamilton Lane launches private credit fund on SOL. CNBC discusses BTC reserve currency rumour. Polymarket sets another trading record. BlockFi administrator submits plan to repay customers. WLD denies insider trading and manipulation claims. India keeps high crypto taxes unchanged. Gate exchange exits Japan. Marathon Digital fined $138m for breaching NDA. HyperLend launches lending on HyperLiquid.

entry.title: Mika Shares How to Sell Crypto Using Kraken Wallet
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Mika guides you through the process of selling crypto and transferring it back to your bank account.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 163 - JOEVER FOR BYEDEN
entry.summary: Crypto dips then bounces on Biden-Harris switch. SOL again leads, DEX volume eclipses ETH + BNB. Biden news had led to $67m liquidations. Democrats have chance to ‚Äòregain crypto vote‚Äô. Mt Gox transfers to Bitstamp expected soon. Crypto sees $3.2bn fund inflows in 3 weeks. China company Boyaa buys $100m BTC. Polymarket saw $80m bets on Biden withdrawal. Polymarket 2024 volumes hit $500m. Elon appearance at Bitcoin Nashville rumoured. Combined SOL, BTC & ETH ETF coming: Geraci. Call skew heads to 2024 extremes in bullish sign. Plan B points to bullish setup in S2F model. Coinbase premium moves back to positive. Gensler likely resigns next year: 10x. Germany already lost $124m profit selling.

entry.title: What's the Meta? Do Crypto Degens Care About Being Scammed?
entry.summary: What's the Meta? With the rise of Pumpdotfun and rug pulls becoming a daily occurrence, why do crypto degens keep investing? Do these investors enjoy being scammed? It appears that people very often invest in meme coins that are very obviously going to rug pull. Once it happens, they just laugh it off on Twitter, is being scammed fun?!

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 162 - SOLANA LEADS THE CHARGE!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$85m. SOL leads majors ahead of ETH ETF. Rumours Trump may want BTC in strategic reserve. Trump BTC round-table tickets going for $845k. Polymarket hits volume record of $20m. ETH ETFs will get steady capital: Binance CEO. Winklevii donate $1m to try and unseat Warren. Tornado sees $1.9bn volume resurgence. New overlay attacks growing in crypto. Messari co-founder faces backlash on views. Raydium integrates with Moonpay. Tencent leads investment round in Chainbase. ZA Bank partners with stablecoin issuers.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 161 - THE BIG WIF COMEBACK?
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$53m. Crypto remains stable despite macro sell-off. ETH ETF providers undercut each other on fees. Grayscale keeps 2.5% high fee, launches mini-fund. Grayscale launches ‚ÄòDecentralised AI Fund‚Äô. Dimon may be ‚Äòchanging tune‚Äô on Bitcoin. Many alts now bounced 50-90% from lows. Vote implies 55% of Mt. Gox depositors won‚Äôt sell. BlockFi to make creditor distributions this month. WazirX exchanges sees $230m suspected breach. Vitalik warns against voting ‚Äòpro-crypto‚Äô. Vitalik & Autism Capital trade barbs. Bitcoin Magazine to hold pro-Trump fundraiser. State Street explore blockchain payments. UPbit sees 44% monthly drop in volume.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 160 - CHATTING TO ROBINHOOD!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$423m. Crypto pushes higher, biggest ETF inflow in 6 weeks. Mt. Gox FUD ‚Äòoverestimated‚Äô as whales accumulate. Kraken to begin Mt. Gox repayments in 7-14d. ETH spot ETFs will push ETH to $5k: Bitwise. SOL ETF will be next: Bloomberg. XRP up 35% this week ahead of potential settlement. Aethir reports $36m H1 customer revenue. Craig Wright now under threat of perjury & forgery. FTX & CFTC in $12.7bn settlement. WLD up 40% after delaying unlock schedule. Helio announces instant crypto fiat commerce. Phantom pauses cross-chain swaps amid exploit.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 159 - MEMECOINS GO MAD!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$301m. BTC dips from $65k as $6bn moves from Mt. Gox. Coinbase & MicroStrategy surge with BTC. Genesis sells another $38m BTC. ETH ETF timeline delayed until July 23rd. Trump chooses crypto friendly Vance as VP. Old clip shows Vance bashing Gensler on crypto. Bitcoin is good during debasement: Larry Fink. Michael Dell calls Fink video ‚Äòfascinating‚Äô. Fear & Greed index shifts to Greed. Tether mints $1bn USDT on Tron. Stripe expands crypto integration to the EU.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 158 - A WILD WEEKEND FOR BITCOIN
entry.summary: Trump response optimism takes BTC to $63K. Bitcoin whales accumulate most since April 2023. Trump still set to talk at Bitcoin Nashville. ETH ETF approval this week: Geraci. XRP vs SEC press conference rumoured on 18th. Crypto funds saw $1.44B inflows last week. Rumours China is to ‚Äòunban BTC‚Äô in Q4. S. Korea may delay crypto taxes until 2028. Russia to allow crypto trading on stock exchange. All altcoin categories outperform BTC over 7d. BitConnect infamous promoter convicted. Scroll becomes 8th L2 with TVL over $1bn. ETHFI Season 2 claims available this week. Base hits record 1m UserOps in a week.
